channel.title: [Rs2] [SrL] Varrok essence miner and banker version 3.1.2 updated -
channel.description:
[CENTER] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [SIZE="5"][Rs2] Varrok Essence Miner Version 3.1.2 [/SIZE] ---------------------------------
hi guys,
Well this i have been promising for a while know and i must say i dont think it could of came out any better, for those of you who have used the older verisons of this script you will know that it was quite a big success and has survived all the way from kaitnieks to this very day. I finnaly decided that an update was in order so i started to work on it.
the script is know 100 setup free, just press run and watch it go....If anyone finds any bugs please report them so that we can make this script flawless.
---------------------------------------------------------------------- .Instructions. ----------------------------------------------------------------------
1. USE Runescape with LowDetail, Very Bright. 2. Set your Screen to 32 bit TRUE color. 3. Set Playernames, Passwords ect ect.... 4. Start location : please refer to line 53-54 5. Be sure to have a pickaxe somewhere (inventory/equipted) ----------------------------------------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Features. -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- SELF setup, colro picking and random ore ammount mining. - SRL updated. - Auto Handling Randoms. - most if not all procedures are fail-safed
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Known Issues. -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- NONE PLEASE REPORT THEM :)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
General Notice: -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Use this script at your own risk. I'm NOT responsible for any Ban or Loss you might encounter using this script.
[/CENTER]
Enjoy..... :)

item.dc:creator: @scar_ownz scar_ownz
item.description:
@scar_ownz wrote:

how are first time posters in here?? heres the solutions to some common error

process picture thing copy dll’s into place inside plugins folder

include file doesnt exist your officially a l33cher

runtime error line # make sure your number of players is set correctly

what is srl… look for yourself l33cher

item.title: [Rs2] [SrL] Varrok essence miner and banker version 3.1.2 updated -
item.dc:creator: @Roffle Roffle
item.description:
@Roffle wrote:

Alright, I tried it out and had the following problems:

  1. it all ran fine until it got to the ess mines, the mouse would go in different places, (trying to locate the ess) but not click the ess. after I clicked the ess for it, it clicked on the opposite rock.

  2. when I got out of the mines (it went to the portal cleanly, no error) it just stood there. I walked to the bank myself, and it clicked toward the east exit (trying to leave the magic shop I guess, it just took EXTREMELY long to do so) and then as it started to walk back, clicked back into the bank.

  3. I had a little trouble banking, as I had to move up a space myself for it to find the bank booth. it would constantly go in a / direction in the same spots until I moved.

  4. after I banked, it walked back to the magic shop well, but it would never teleport. The mouse rolled over Aubury alot, but never clicked him to teleport.

  5. Everything else worked well.

Read full topic
item.source: [Rs2] [SrL] Varrok essence miner and banker version 3.1.2 updated -

[/quote]

Do you have the newest SCAR? For so long I couldn’t find out why it did that. Then I realsied I had SCAR 2.02. Heh.[/quote]

Well i have SCAR 2.03 is that the new one? i get that same error. Pls help. Thnx!

item.title: [Rs2] [SrL] Varrok essence miner and banker version 3.1.2 updated -
item.dc:creator: @muna580 muna580
item.description:
@muna580 wrote:

jameslumb:

Sorry, but where exactly do I go/ what exactly do I do to get SRL includes?

You can get the SRL includes over here. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,3617.0.html

Btw the script doens’t work properly. It starts at the bank and then goes to the shop. Then it talks to the man and it gets telported to the mining room. Then in the mining room it clicks at a location on the minimap. This is where the problem beings. The man walks to the location and from there all the scirpt does is move around the mouse as if it is looking for something. It just keeps moving the mouse everwhere and deosn’t find the mining location.

Hey another probelm I found is that, when the above problem doens’t happen this problem comes up. It goes and mines the ess. Then it goes back to the shop and just stands there. It doesn’t do anything, it just stands in the shop with the invertory full of ess. It doesn’t go back to bank. [br][size=1]Posted at: May 27, 2006, 01:39:55 pm[/size][hr]
Btw the script doens’t work properly. It starts at the bank and then goes to the shop. Then it talks to the man and it gets telported to the mining room. Then in the mining room it clicks at a location on the minimap. This is where the problem beings. The man walks to the location and from there all the scirpt does is move around the mouse as if it is looking for something. It just keeps moving the mouse everwhere and deosn’t find the mining location.

Hey another probelm I found is that, when the above problem doens’t happen this problem comes up. It goes and mines the ess. Then it goes back to the shop and just stands there. It doesn’t do anything, it just stands in the shop with the invertory full of ess. It doesn’t go back to bank.

Read full topic

item.title: [Rs2] [SrL] Varrok essence miner and banker version 3.1.2 updated -
item.dc:creator: @solemn_wishes solemn wishes
item.description:
@solemn_wishes wrote:

[CENTER]

[SIZE=“5”][Rs2] Varrok Essence Miner Version 3.1.2 [/SIZE]

hi guys,

      Well this i have been promising for a while know and i must say i dont think it could of came out any better, for those of you who have used the older verisons of this script you will know that it was quite a big success and has survived all the way from kaitnieks to this very day. I finnaly decided that an update was in order so i started to work on it.

the script is know 100 setup free, just press run and watch it go…If anyone finds any bugs please report them so that we can make this script flawless.

                      .Instructions.
  1. USE Runescape with LowDetail, Very Bright.
  2. Set your Screen to 32 bit TRUE color.
  3. Set Playernames, Passwords ect ect…
  4. Start location : please refer to line 53-54
  5. Be sure to have a pickaxe somewhere (inventory/equipted)

Features.

  • SELF setup, colro picking and random ore ammount mining.
  • SRL updated.
  • Auto Handling Randoms.
  • most if not all procedures are fail-safed

Known Issues.

  • NONE PLEASE REPORT THEM

General Notice:

Use this script at your own risk. I’m NOT responsible for any Ban or Loss you might encounter using this script.

[/CENTER]

Enjoy…

Read full topic
